# OIAN
![Prevertebral muscles anterior view @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/Alchemy Archive/Anatomy/OIANs/images/prevertebral mm fig3.7b gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020.png){#fig-prevertebralmm_ant}

| Muscle  | Origin  | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|--------|----------|-----------|-------|--------|
| Longus Capitis | C3-C6 (TP, ant tubercles) | Occipital bone (basilar part) | Direct branches from cervical plexus (C1-C3) | Bilaterally flexes head; Unilaterally flexes and slight I/L rotation |

: Longus capitis OIAN {.striped .hover}

## Origin
C3-C6 (TP, ant tubercles) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
Direct branches from cervical plexus (C1-C3) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: Flexes head
- **Unilateral**: Flexes and slight I/L rotation

# Muscle groups
Longus capitis is part of the [prevertebral muscle group]({{< var ref-oians >}})
